org.apache.ambari.server.orm.entities

Class AlertTargetEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.orm.entities.AlertTargetEntity

  • @Entity
public class AlertTargetEntity
extends Object
    The AlertTargetEntity class represents audience that will receive dispatches when an alert is triggered.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlertTargetEntity() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addAlertGroup(AlertGroupEntity alertGroup)
      Adds the specified alert group to the groups that this target is associated with.
      protected void addAlertNotice(AlertNoticeEntity notice)
      Adds the specified notice to the notices that have been sent out for this target.

        public Long getTargetId()
        Gets the unique ID of this alert target.
        Returns:
        the ID of the target (never null).

        Sets the unique ID of this alert target.
        Parameters:
        targetId - the ID of the alert target (not null).

      • getTargetName

        public String getTargetName()
        Gets the name of this alert target.
        Returns:
        the alert target name (never null).

      • isGlobal

        public boolean isGlobal()
        Gets whether the alert target is a global target and will receive notifications triggered for any alert group.
        Returns:
        the isGlobal if the target is global.

      • setGlobal

        public void setGlobal(boolean isGlobal)
        Sets whether the alert target is a global target and will receive notifications triggered for any alert group.
        Parameters:
        isGlobal - if the target is global.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Gets whether the alert target is enabled. Targets which are not enabled will not receive notifications.
        Returns:
        the true if the target is enabled.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean isEnabled)
        Sets whether the alert target is enabled. Targets which are not enabled will not receive notifications.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - if the target is enabled.

      • getAlertStates

        public Set<AlertState> getAlertStates()
        Gets the alert states that will cause a triggered alert to be sent to this target. A target may be associated with a group where an alert has changed state, but if that new state is not of interest to the target, it will not be sent.
        Returns:
        the set of alert states or null or empty to imply all.

      • setAlertStates

        public void setAlertStates(Set<AlertState> alertStates)
        Sets the alert states that will cause a triggered alert to be sent to this target. A target may be associated with a group where an alert has changed state, but if that new state is not of interest to the target, it will not be sent.
        Parameters:
        alertStates - the set of alert states or null or empty to imply all.

      • setTargetName

        public void setTargetName(String targetName)
        Sets the name of this alert target.
        Parameters:
        targetName - the name (not null).

      • getAlertGroups

        public Set<AlertGroupEntity> getAlertGroups()
        Gets an immutable set of the alert groups that this target is associated with.
        Returns:
        the groups that will send to this target when an alert in that group is received, or an empty set for none.

      • setAlertGroups

        public void setAlertGroups(Set<AlertGroupEntity> alertGroups)
        Sets all of the groups that are associated with this target.
        Parameters:
        alertGroups - the groups, or null if there are none.

      • addAlertGroup

        protected void addAlertGroup(AlertGroupEntity alertGroup)
        Adds the specified alert group to the groups that this target is associated with. This is used to complement the JPA bidirectional association.
        Parameters:
        alertGroup -

      • removeAlertGroup

        protected void removeAlertGroup(AlertGroupEntity alertGroup)
        Removes the specified alert group to the groups that this target is associated with. This is used to complement the JPA bidirectional association.
        Parameters:
        alertGroup -

      • addAlertNotice

        protected void addAlertNotice(AlertNoticeEntity notice)
        Adds the specified notice to the notices that have been sent out for this target.
        Parameters:
        notice - the notice.

        public void preRemove()
        Called before EntityManager.remove(Object) for this entity, removes the non-owning relationship between targets and groups.
